title: Queue Schedule for Twisted Treeline
body:
I am playing on the OCE servers and i have noticed that Twisted Treeline isn't always available and i saw [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZzQR1haM-queue-schedule-updated) that there is schedule for when it is available. Can someone please tell me why this is and if this is likely to change in the future

Thanks

replies.body: Due to a smaller relative player base compared to North America and the European servers, to maintain better matchmaking, certain queues are only available at certain times (when there is a good number of players able to play with other players similar in skill). If the player base grows considerably, at some point scheduled queues will no longer be necessary and they'll be made available at all times like on NA, EUW, and EUNE.
